title: Help End Attacks On Hindus In Bangladesh: 2 Indian-American Lawmakers To US
content: Two prominent Indian-American lawmakers have sought the US' direct intervention to stop the "coordinated attacks" against minority Hindus in Bangladesh.
summary: Two prominent Indian-American lawmakers have sought the US' direct intervention to stop the "coordinated attacks" against minority Hindus in Bangladesh.

title: This Belarusian Wheelchair Barista Claims To "Make The World Better"
content: With its sleek interior and freshly ground coffee, the cafe run by Belarusian exile Sasha Avdevich may at first glance seem like yet another trendy spot in Warsaw.
summary: With its sleek interior and freshly ground coffee, the cafe run by Belarusian exile Sasha Avdevich may at first glance seem like yet another trendy spot in Warsaw.

title: Amid Protests, 12 Killed In Twin Bangladesh Jailbreaks
content: Twin jailbreaks in Bangladesh killed at least 12 inmates and freed hundreds more in the chaotic days after the ouster of autocratic premier Sheikh Hasina, officials told AFP Saturday.
summary: Twin jailbreaks in Bangladesh killed at least 12 inmates and freed hundreds more in the chaotic days after the ouster of autocratic premier Sheikh Hasina, officials told AFP Saturday.

title: Dozens Of Rohingyas Killed In Drone Attack While Fleeing Myanmar
content: A drone attack on Rohingya fleeing Myanmar killed many dozens of people, including families with children, several witnesses said, describing survivors wandering between piles of bodies to identify dead and injured relatives.
summary: A drone attack on Rohingya fleeing Myanmar killed many dozens of people, including families with children, several witnesses said, describing survivors wandering between piles of bodies to identify dead and injured relatives.

title: Russia Launches "Counter-Terror Operation" To Stop Advancing Ukraine Troops
content: Moscow on Saturday launched a "counter-terror operation" in three border regions adjoining Ukraine to halt Kyiv's biggest cross-border offensive in the two-and-a-half-year conflict.
summary: Moscow on Saturday launched a "counter-terror operation" in three border regions adjoining Ukraine to halt Kyiv's biggest cross-border offensive in the two-and-a-half-year conflict.

title: Former YouTube CEO Susan Wojcicki Started Career As Photojournalist In India
content: Former YouTube CEO Susan Wojcicki, who was also one of the first Google employees, has died after a two-year battle with cancer. She was 56.
summary: Former YouTube CEO Susan Wojcicki, who was also one of the first Google employees, has died after a two-year battle with cancer. She was 56.

title: Bangladesh LIVE: Chief Justice Resigns After Protests, One-Hour Ultimatum
content: Protests refuse to die down in Bangladesh. The country's Chief Justice, seen as a loyalist of former prime minister Sheikh Hasina, was forced to resign this afternoon after an ultimatum from protesting students.
summary: Protests refuse to die down in Bangladesh. The country's Chief Justice, seen as a loyalist of former prime minister Sheikh Hasina, was forced to resign this afternoon after an ultimatum from protesting students.

title: How Sheikh Hasina's Ouster Affects India-Bangladesh Diplomatic Ties
content: The ouster of Bangladesh's autocratic premier sparked celebrations in Dhaka this week but alarm in neighbouring India, which backed Sheikh Hasina to counter rival China and quash Islamist alternatives, analysts say.
summary: The ouster of Bangladesh's autocratic premier sparked celebrations in Dhaka this week but alarm in neighbouring India, which backed Sheikh Hasina to counter rival China and quash Islamist alternatives, analysts say.

title: Narrow Escape For Brazilian Man, The Flight He Missed Crashed Killing All
content: Late arrival for boarding helped a Brazilian man escape death as the flight he missed met a tragic end last evening.
summary: Late arrival for boarding helped a Brazilian man escape death as the flight he missed met a tragic end last evening.

title: Bangladesh Chief Justice Resigns After Ultimatum From Student Protesters
content: The chief justice of Bangladesh's top court agreed to resign "in principle" after an ultimatum to do so from protesters, broadcaster Jamuna TV reported.
summary: The chief justice of Bangladesh's top court agreed to resign "in principle" after an ultimatum to do so from protesters, broadcaster Jamuna TV reported.

title: AI Can Make People Bond With Bots More Than Humans, OpenAI Worries
content: OpenAI says it is concerned that a realistic voice feature for its artificial intelligence might cause people to bond with the bot at the cost of human interactions.
summary: OpenAI says it is concerned that a realistic voice feature for its artificial intelligence might cause people to bond with the bot at the cost of human interactions.

title: YouTube Ex-CEO Susan Wojcicki Dies, Sundar Pichai "Unbelievably Saddened"
content: Susan Wojcicki, once a key figure in Google's history, passed away after a two-year battle with cancer, Alphabet and Google CEO Sundar Pichai informed on Saturday.
summary: Susan Wojcicki, once a key figure in Google's history, passed away after a two-year battle with cancer, Alphabet and Google CEO Sundar Pichai informed on Saturday.

title: Simone Biles vs MyKayla Skinner: Why US Gymnasts Are Fighting Amid Olympics
content: Simone Biles and MyKayla Skinner, the two teammates during the 2016 Rio and the 2020 Tokyo Olympics, have been embroiled in a major feud recently.
summary: Simone Biles and MyKayla Skinner, the two teammates during the 2016 Rio and the 2020 Tokyo Olympics, have been embroiled in a major feud recently.

title: Why Bangladesh Chief Justice, Sheikh Hasina Loyalist, Was Forced To Quit
content: The Chief Justice of Bangladesh, Obaidul Hassan, resigned today following massive protests by students who surrounded the Supreme Court.
summary: The Chief Justice of Bangladesh, Obaidul Hassan, resigned today following massive protests by students who surrounded the Supreme Court.

title: Fugitive Catalan Leader Carles Puigdemont Returns to Belgium
content: Fugitive Catalan separatist leader Carles Puigdemont said Friday he had left Spain for Belgium after briefly addressing supporters in Barcelona, sparking a row over how he evaded arrest again.
summary: Fugitive Catalan separatist leader Carles Puigdemont said Friday he had left Spain for Belgium after briefly addressing supporters in Barcelona, sparking a row over how he evaded arrest again.

title: Wrongly Jailed UK Man Forced To Pay Rs 1 Crore In 'Bed And Board' Fees
content: Malkinson, who spent 17 years wrongfully imprisoned, will see a deduction of 100,000 pounds (Rs 1,06,88,639) from his compensation.
summary: Malkinson, who spent 17 years wrongfully imprisoned, will see a deduction of 100,000 pounds (Rs 1,06,88,639) from his compensation.

title: King Charles III Ends Silence On UK Far-Right Riots, Praises Police Efforts
content: King Charles III made his first comments on Friday about riots that have shaken British cities, praising the work of police in countering the violence.
summary: King Charles III made his first comments on Friday about riots that have shaken British cities, praising the work of police in countering the violence.

title: "Saw The Plane Spinning": Witness Describes Crash Horror In Brazil
content: An airplane with 57 passengers and four crew members on board crashed in Brazil's Sao Paulo, killing everyone on board. Images and videos from the spot show that the crash left flaming wreckage in a residential neighborhood.
summary: An airplane with 57 passengers and four crew members on board crashed in Brazil's Sao Paulo, killing everyone on board. Images and videos from the spot show that the crash left flaming wreckage in a residential neighborhood.
